DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) thickness plantar fascia measure ultrasonographic examination among patient chronic plantar fascitis . The change plantar fascia thickness correlate clinical improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Change Clinical Significance Plantar Fascia Thickness After ESWT
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate effect extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) thickness plantar fascia measure ultrasonographic examination among patient chronic plantar fascitis . Two different dosage ESWT apply , outcome follow 3 6 month treatment . The change plantar fascia thickness correlate clinical improvement , include pain improvement , foot function , quality life follow .
DOC.criteria: diagnose plantar fasciitis least 6 month refractory conservative treatment Acute infection soft tissue/bone Malignancy Epiphysiolysis focus Blood coagulation disorder Pregnancy Patients pacemaker Foot deformity Autoimmune disordersrelated arthropahy Sciatica Previous treatment ESWT
